item.title: Mod Please Delete
item.dc:creator: @Deathspirit Deathspirit
item.description:
@Deathspirit wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:1, topic:316396”]I don’t see any development happening here, I’ll give you a few days to show some, otherwise this topic will be locked.[/quote]Give him some more time to add picture’s… Seriously he couldn’t because i wasn’t online on msn and i am; Brandon.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 26, 2009, 11:29:05 am[/size][hr][quote=“HcoJustin, post:1, topic:316392”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=412938.msg3042522#msg3042522 date=1259221395]and the server is most likely made in C++.
[/quote]

You made me lul. They’ve stated in two of their development diaries that the server is Java.

But now, what do you see now? I’ll tell you what i see, i see Jagex jacking up the price on their membership payments

Inflation plehz? They didn’t raise them because they could, they raised them to keep their profit margins the same.[/quote]Yeah ofcourse, the thing they think mostly about is the ‘MONEY’.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 26, 2009, 11:32:14 am[/size][hr][quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:316380”]tl; dr

read one paragraph close to bottom.

  1. It’s not JavaScript idiot.
  2. It’s not Jagex programmers that are the problem, it is their ideas.
  3. How do you know you source will be so much better then any other?
  4. You knowledge of Java can still be very limited and be a good coder, and vice-verca. It’s all about your knowledge of the server type.[/quote]I may not be the best private server programmer but i know what i’m doing, i did set up all stuff i needed and not just download a Allstar base like many others. I started with a empty server with completely nothing not even charactre loading i made mostly all of the package’s myself.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 26, 2009, 11:34:38 am[/size][hr][quote=“ollie123, post:1, topic:316385”]Bull shit. How the fuck can a kid equate to 50 professional qualified programmers? And RuneScape isn’t made in JavaScript, it’s made in Java, and the server is most likely made in C++. LEARN THE DIFFERENCE![/quote]Because it was a figurative question. And also as you saw my comment above i made the server myself so it is mostly Java i suppose?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 26, 2009, 11:37:45 am[/size][hr][quote=“13th ranger, post:1, topic:316390”]tl;dr,

first of all i doubt his the best “java programer” because firstly, why would he need a person like you,

also better than 50 jagex programers, loled. you do realize they have degree’s?

didnt read past there[/quote]If you compared all Moparscaper’s to a good programmer the percentage will be low.

[center]cough Now leave haters. Pictures and information will be posted soon.[/center]

item.title: Mod Please Delete
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:316380”]tl; dr

read one paragraph close to bottom.

  1. It’s not JavaScript idiot.
  2. It’s not Jagex programmers that are the problem, it is their ideas.
  3. How do you know you source will be so much better then any other?
  4. You knowledge of Java can still be very limited and be a good coder, and vice-verca. It’s all about your knowledge of the server type.[/quote]

To add on I doubt this will get off the ground and become a huge project, I just can’t take this serious.

Also 50 Jagex coders? I doubt really any one here has the knowledge they have, except the selected few we all know and love, so I am trying to say I am doubting that he is as good as your saying

Also again the reason they have to bring the price up is because of the shit economy I doubt they really need it but the economy sucks and prices on things are going up meaning they have to jack out a lot more money

Also again and again the reason it sucks now is because there trying to bring it into the future with better graphics updates and trying to add more fun things to do which we know they fail at.

Read full topic
